title: Custom Douser Dualies FF
paragraphs: The Custom Douser Dualies FF are main weapons in Splatoon 3. It is a Custom branded variant of the Douser Dualies FF with a different kit and design.

The Custom Douser Dualies FF made their debut in Sizzle Season 2024. Its kit consists of Burst Bomb and Triple Inkstrike. The weapon has been redesigned, featuring yellow and blue colors instead of the traditional red and green. Custom logo stickers have been placed on both barrels, however the one on the left-hand dualie is mirrored.
